testcase.name: An automation task is needed to simulate the search for a lesson on nagwa website then opening the lesson worksheet to count the number of questions in this worksheet
testcase.system-out: Given Use the search icon to start searching on Nagwa lessons...............passed And Write any lesson name for example “addition” then search................passed And A list with all lessons in Nagwa that match this name will appear.......passed And Click on 2nd lesson in the search results to open its home page.........passed And Go to worksheet section then click preview button.......................passed Then print the count........................................................passed
